welcome.title: HIMITSU
welcome.content:
Welcome to "Himitsu" - Your ultimate chat app for privacy and data security!

Your safety and privacy are our top priorities. With Himitsu, you can communicate with confidence and confidentiality, without worrying about the security of your data. Our app offers you:

🔒 Encrypted Data Transmission: Every message you send is securely encrypted to ensure that only you and your conversation partner have access to the content.

🔥 Self-Destruct Button: Your privacy is in your hands. With just two simple clicks, you can not only delete the app but also all associated data from your device - giving you the utmost control over your communication.

🚫 No Unwanted Messages from Unknown Contacts: We ensure that you only receive messages from those you know and trust. Say goodbye to annoying spam and unwanted messages!

Himitsu is dedicated to your safety and privacy. Join our community and experience a new dimension of secure and confidential chat. Welcome to "Himitsu" - where your privacy is protected and respected.

battery.title: Battery Optimization
battery.content:
In order to enable smooth and uninterrupted navigation while the app is running in the background, battery optimization needs to be disabled for this app.
Therefore, please allow us to disable battery optimization of your smartphone for this app :)

driverNote.content: WARNING: This note is only for the driver of the current tour and will not be submitted to the backoffice

tour.mileageAtStart: Mileage at the start of the tour
tour.timeAtStart: Time at the start of the tour
tour.enterMileage: Please enter the mileage after you have completed the tour and returned to base.

message.uploadSuccessful: The file has been uploaded successfully

title.finishLoadUp: Finish load up and start delivering?
title.navigateToBase: Do you want to be navigated back to base?

content.finishLoadUp: Not all boxes have been loaded up
content.differentLocation: The location, on which you confirmed the delivery, is more than 50 meters away from the stored address. Do you want to set the current location as the location for this address?
content.finishTour: Do you really want to complete the tour?
content.abortTour: Do you really want to abort the tour?
content.confirmDelivery: WARNING: Only confirm this window, if you have completed this delivery
content.notAllStationsDelivered: WARNING: Some of the stations haven't been marked as 'delivered'. Do you still want to finish this tour?
content.navigateToBase: Do you want to be navigated back to base?
content.noVehicleSelected: Please select a vehicle before completing this tour
content.editNote: WARNING: This note is only for the driver of the current tour and will not be sent to the office
content.alreadyAvailable: This tour is already available on this device! Skip re-download?
content.downloadTour: Do you want to download and start this tour?

error.alreadyLoggedOnOtherDevice: This user is already logged in on a different device

http.3xx: Some requirements are missing to complete the request
http.4xx: The request is invalid or un-authorized
http.5xx: The server is unavailable at the time or unable to process the request
http.missingToken: The token for the current session is missing

error.emptyText: Please fill in the text field!
error.endMileageSmallerThanStart: The mileage can't be smaller than at the start of the tour!
error.endLoadUpTimeBeforeStart: The time at the start of loading up can't !
error.uploadFile: The file could not be uploaded
